# Simple Colabfold: Minimal Structure Prediction

Google Colab notebook to build AlphaFold predictions from a pasted sequence.

Built with assistance from Claude Opus and the author's existing notebook code: any academic credit should accrue to results. This notebook is shared for auditability and potential use by other students, not in direct consideration for credit.  The goal was to make it work and be as readable and correct as possible.  All code used is either the author's or tool generated for this project.

Created for other students in the Fall 2025 MBL program.  If you find it useful, that's wonderful -- and please feel free to ask questions or give feedback -- but intended long term use is as example.

Example sequence (may contain errors in human transcription): 



<img width="1160" height="934" alt="image" src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/24c8e088-dc0f-4b1b-ad92-847d820ad5a5" />

From: 

Lamb, F. I., Roberts, L. M., & Lord, J. M. (1985). Nucleotide sequence of cloned cDNA coding for preproricin. European Journal of Biochemistry, 148(2), 265â€“270. <

You must select a GPU instance to run Alphafold.  By running the final cell, you can download the results to your google drive.
